name: Magic Miauz
description:
Welcome to Miauz Academy!

You play as a little cat named Tammy and it's her first day of school. Help her to decide which element she belongs to. 

There are Fire, Water, Air and Earth. Each element represents a different specialization. Complete small tasks that will help you to decide. You can talk to other students and interact with different items. 


Sp1tfire, Flenders, Magilou Prove, K4YT0 and Sateklon and everyone from my class at htk academy. 

Unity, Adobe Illustrator, Fmod, Inkie, Blender

Sounds and music - WeLoveIndies

Grass Shader - MinionsArt

Font (Elsie) - FontSquirrel

Skybox - Unity Asset Store
